pages.title: RailCraft
pages.text: Have you ever wished trains and rails had received a bit more attention during the development of Minecraft? Well that ends now! in their place are a ton of new cool tools to build your giant rail system. If you ever cared about train tracks and what you make, you won't ever look back!$(br2)$(l:http://railcraft.info/wiki/start)Railcraft Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: Features
pages.text: $(l)- Cheaper Tracks$()$(br)64 Tracks for every 6 iron.$(br)$(l)- Crowbar$()$(br)Rapid rail adjustment.$(br)$(l)- Tunnel Bore$()$(br)Avoid the monotony of digging perfect tunnels!$(br)$(l)- Cart Linking$()$(br)Make a real train!$(br)$(l)- High Speed Rails$()$(br)Get there faster!$(br)$(l)- Detector Blocks$()$(br)More control over your carts.$(br2)- Plus loads more!
